document.full_text: as online social networks have surged in popularity with gay men and lesbians, many gay social groups are in decline, with an attendant drop in fund-raising for gay causes.
document.title: as web flourishes, gay groups watch enrollments dwindle
lines_and_colors: as online social networks have surged in popularity with gay men and lesbians, many gay social groups are in decline, with an attendant drop in fund-raising for gay causes.
